data.lyric:
[ti:Happy Does]
[ar:Kenny Chesney]
[al:Here And Now]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Happy Does - Kenny Chesney (肯尼·切斯尼)
[00:04.30]Lyrics by：Brad Clawson/Brock Berryhill/Greylan James/Jamie Paulin
[00:08.61]Ol' Sunaco Charlie drives an '87 Harley
[00:13.00]Sells gasoline and what you drink 8 to 3 AM
[00:17.37]Got a tattoo for the Corps and ex-wife number 4
[00:21.99]Hummin' along schoolin' ya on the songs on his station
[00:26.12]He could be another one cussin' the government no but he smiles
[00:30.38]Got hundred reasons not to but he's the poster child for
[00:34.70]Happy is as happy does
[00:39.32]Grab a six-string find a rope swing
[00:41.57]Hang a palm tree in your truck
[00:43.31]Drink a beer just because
[00:48.21]Steal a slow dance in a rainstorm
[00:50.11]And a kiss from who you love
[00:52.84]Laugh and live with a half-full cup
[00:56.46]Yeah happy is as happy does
[01:01.49]Some find it in the scripture or a Polaroid picture
[01:05.88]Or flip a coin heads you're goin' to Tucson Arizona
[01:10.20]But it d**n sure ain't in the lookin' back on the stuff you never did
[01:14.61]Sometimes you're gonna feel that but life is better when
[01:18.66]Happy is as happy does
[01:23.47]Grab a six-string find a rope swing
[01:25.61]Hang a palm tree in your truck
[01:27.53]Drink a beer just because
[01:32.21]Steal a slow dance in a rainstorm
[01:34.20]And a kiss from who you love
[01:36.83]Laugh and live with a half-full cup
[01:40.43]'Cause happy is as happy does
[01:49.93]She's a long way from the old her
[01:52.12]In this mountain dive in Boulder
[01:54.18]Every pickle jar crinkled dollar takes her another mile high
[02:00.53]Happy is as happy does
[02:05.34]Grab a six-string find a rope swing
[02:07.42]Hang a palm tree in your truck
[02:09.42]Drink a beer just because
[02:13.97]Steal a slow dance in a rainstorm
[02:16.02]And a kiss from who you love
[02:18.62]Laugh and live with a half-full cup
[02:22.77]When it's all black clouds find the sun
[02:26.85]'Cause happy is as happy does
[02:36.01]Happy is as happy does
[02:43.05]Laugh and live with a half-full cup
data.trans:
[ti:Happy Does]
[ar:Kenny Chesney]
[al:Here And Now]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:04.30]//
[00:08.61]Sunoco Charlie骑着一辆八七年产的哈雷
[00:13.00]卖汽油和酒水 从早上八点到凌晨三点
[00:17.37]身上有个部队的纹身 他还有四个前妻
[00:21.99]哼着歌 用他电台里的歌来教育你
[00:26.12]他大可以骂一骂当权者 但他没有 反而微微笑
[00:30.38]有一百个理由责备别人 但他就是喜欢
[00:34.70]快快乐乐地过
[00:39.32]拿起一把吉他 找个秋千坐下
[00:41.57]在你的车里挂一个棕榈树的吊坠
[00:43.31]随便喝杯啤酒
[00:48.21]就算狂风暴雨 也要轻歌曼舞
[00:50.11]偷偷亲吻一下你爱的人
[00:52.84]快乐地生活 差不多就行了
[00:56.46]快快乐乐地过
[01:01.49]有些人在圣经或者宝丽来照片中找到快乐
[01:05.88]或者抛出一枚硬币 如果是正面 你就去亚利桑那州的图森
[01:10.20]但可以确定的是 悔恨过往 并不能让你拥有快乐
[01:14.61]有时候 你会感到不安 但是更美好的生活需要你
[01:18.66]快快乐乐地过
[01:23.47]拿起一把吉他 找个秋千坐下
[01:25.61]在你的车里挂一个棕榈树的吊坠
[01:27.53]随便喝杯啤酒
[01:32.21]就算狂风暴雨 也要轻歌曼舞
[01:34.20]偷偷亲吻一下你爱的人
[01:36.83]快乐地生活 差不多就行了
[01:40.43]因为快乐生活最重要
[01:49.93]她早已不是从前的她
[01:52.12]生活在波德市这座山里
[01:54.18]日常生活中的小事情都能让她感到很快乐
[02:00.53]快快乐乐地过
[02:05.34]拿起一把吉他 找个秋千坐下
[02:07.42]在你的车里挂一个棕榈树的吊坠
[02:09.42]随便喝杯啤酒
[02:13.97]就算狂风暴雨 也要轻歌曼舞
[02:16.02]偷偷亲吻一下你爱的人
[02:18.62]快乐地生活 差不多就行了
[02:22.77]当天空乌云密布时 就努力寻找阳光
[02:26.85]因为快乐生活最重要
[02:36.01]快快乐乐地过
[02:43.05]快乐地生活 差不多就行了
